text: Hossam Salama (; born 15 November 1983), also known as Hossam Paulo (), or simply Paulo, is an Egyptian footballer who plays for Egyptian Premier League side Tala'ea El Gaish SC as a forward. ==Honours== ===Zamalek=== *Egyptian Super Cup: 2016 ===Individual=== *Egyptian Premier League top goalscorer (2): 2014–15 (20 goals), 2015–16 (17 goals). ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Egypt international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:People from Qalyubia Governorate Category:Egyptian Premier League players Category:Smouha SC players Category:Zamalek SC players Category:El Dakhleya SC players Category:Al Ittihad Alexandria Club players Category:Al Mokawloon Al Arab SC players Category:El Shams SC players Category:Tala'ea El Gaish SC players
title: Hossam Salama
